Author: Pyxxiss
Text: Don't blame yourself hon, it's not you, it's your disorder. breathe and forgive yourself. It's not your fault. Your disorder got the better of you, use this as motivation to not let it ruin anything else. I get it hurts and it will hurt for a while, feel the pain and let it go. Let him go. There will be other boys who love and care for you and will be there to support you, and you should never be ashamed of your eating disorder. It is one problem, one burden you must bare and you need to get rid of it. Nobody else is inconvenienced by it like you are. Stay strong sweetheart, you deserve happiness and love. Don't let your ed tell you otherwise.
